caption: Since 2014, after his father spoke in support of BJP, tragedy struck the family — three brothers killed under Shahabuddin’s terror. Chanda Babu’s fourth son now stays away from the media. OpIndia Exclusive

Gopal Tiwari exposes the hypocrisy of media outlets trying to whitewash Samajwadi leader and alleged mafia Azam Khan, who walks out of jail after months in custody facing multiple corruption and forgery cases.

Former Punjab DGP Mustafa’s son accused his father of having an illegal relationship with his wife before his mysterious death. Haryana Police have filed a case. Cabinet minister Razia Sultana’s role under scrutiny. @RitikaChandola reports.

Three women booked for offering namaz inside Pune's historic Shaniwar Wada after video went viral. Pune City police have filed an FIR under the Ancient Monuments and Archaeological Sites and Remains (AMASR) Rules, 1959, for violating restrictions applicable to protected monuments.

"The day isn’t far when even this court building will be declared Waqf."

In Kerala’s Munambam, the Waqf Board tried to seize land belonging to 400 Hindu and Christian families — even sending them eviction notices. Backed by Islamist hardliners and silently supported by the Communist government, the Board pushed its claim aggressively.

But now, the Kerala High Court has declared the move to label the land as Waqf illegal and rebuked the Board. How did this battle, which began in the 1950s, reach this turning point? Explained by @mediaharshv
